Commands.Umbral Vise: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Deals very high damage to debuffed targets.  Inflicts Small Max BRV Down, Small Defense Down, Small Speed Down on the target for 3 turns.  Grants Saboteur F stance for 3 turns and removes Commando F stance.  Saboteur F raises Max BRV.
Commands.Whirlwind: 2-HIT BRV+HP.  Initiates a Chase Sequence if the target is broken.  Grants Commando F stance for 3 turns and removes Saboteur F stance.  Commando F raises Max BRV and Attack.
Commands.Chase HP Damage Up All: Slightly raises party HP damage dealt during a Chase Sequence for 3 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Highwind: 3-HIT AoE ranged BRV + ST HP attack  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  Grants 2 stacks of 「Fangs of Transgression」 for 6 turns (max is 5)  Turns to 「Highwind+」 while 「Fangs of Transgression」 is at 5 stacks   「Fangs of Transgression」 has the following effects:  - Raises self Max BRV and Speed  - Lowers all enemies' Speed

Passives.Umbral Vise Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Umbral Vise.
Passives.HP Damage Guard: Slightly raises Defense after taking HP damage.
Passives.Whirlwind Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Whirlwind.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Umbral Vise Charge: Increases the max uses of Umbral Vise by 1.
Passives.Target Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when attacking an enemy targeting self.
Passives.Whirlwind Charge: Increases the max uses of Whirlwind by 1.
Passives.Gran Pulse Warrior: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Smash Attack&Boost Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and moderately raises Attack for 8 turns after initiating a Chase Sequence
Passives.Umbral Vise Extend: Umbral Vise  use +1When using  Umbral Vise :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 3- Tremendously raises its total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Slightly improves the effects of  Saboteur F - Grants 1 stack of  Fangs of Transgression  for 6 turns (max is 5)- If target is inflicted with a debuff, grants an additional stack of  Fangs of Transgression - Triggers an HP attack after useWhile  Saboteur F  is active:- Turns  BRV Attack  to  BRV Attack (Saboteur)    Increases the number of BRV hits to 2  Slightly raises its total BRV potency  Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to debuffed enemies  Low Action Delay
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed Up: Moderately raises Attack and Speed while buffed
Passives.Whirlwind Extend: When using  Whirlwind :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 3- Greatly raises its total BRV potency- BRV Hits become AoE (Chase effect remains single target)- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- Slightly improves the effects of  Commando F - Grants 1 stack of  Fangs of Transgression  for 6 turns (max is 5)- If target is broken or gets broken, grants an additional stack of  Fangs of Transgression While  Commando F  is active:- Turns  BRV Attack  to  BRV Attack (Commando)    Increases the number of BRV hits to 2  Slightly raises its total BRV potency  BRV Hits become AoE  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target ( BRV Attack  during Chase is unaffected
Passives.Chase HP Damage Up All Extend: When using  Chase HP Damage Up All , adds the following effect:- Slightly raises self Attack for 3 turns

Weapons.Glaive CP: 35: Raises the potency of Whirlwind.Raises the potency further when the target is broken.Grants Small Physical Attack up for 10 turns.Raises the potency of Commando F and extends its duration.
Weapons.Bladed Lance CP: 15: Raises the potency of Umbral Vise.Raises the potency of Max BRV Down, Defense Down and Speed Down, and extends their duration.Extends the duration of Saboteur F.
Weapons.Dragoon Lance CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Highwind
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Chase HP Damage Up All  use +2
